line.comment: * Note 1: the new ship doesn't always equip its lasers into the same slots.
* Note 2: the new ship can spawn at a slightly different position.
* * Add-Ons 1.2: The number of guns to retain for a captured ship is based on difficulty. Retain and equip 100%/75%/50%/25% on easy/normal/hard/insane.
* * Does not apply to ships respawning due to friendly fire or station collision (see !ship.signal.killed).
* Add-Ons 1.4: Copy scan locked variable so that the copied ship cannot be scanned again.
* Herobetty 5.4: Copy over the marines and free maintenance flag.
* Add-Ons 1.4.10: Copy number of pandora tunings. Renegades can get up to 2 pandora tunings while others can get up to 1.
* Add-Ons 1.3.14: Fix lasers sitting in cargo bay.
* Add-Ons 1.3.14: Fix lasers sitting in cargo bay.
* $text = 'Precondition: gun ' + $gun + ' at slot ' + $slot + ' in turret ' + $turret + '. Number of slots: ' + $nbSlots
* If original slot was empty, skip.
* Gun is the laser ware type this slot can use. Find the gun type in the surviving laser list.
* How many of this gun type remain? If none, skip this slot.
* Install the laser. Decrement the remaining count of this gun type.
* We don't want (duplicated) marines or any passengers.
* Herobetty 5.4: (Comments only) First, delete the old marines and passengers. Based on testing, a cloned ship has duplicated marines. We don't want that.
* Herobetty 5.4: Now copy the marines over, if there were any.
* Add-Ons 1.4.7: Copy them over if the source was not destroyed. The only times that the source will not be destroyed are in ZH.Sig.Captured and in !ship.signal.killed.
* Add-Ons 1.4: Fixed bailed ships being scannable. Technically, bailed ships are new ships, but all the metadata from the old ship is supposed to be copied over.
* Herobetty 5.4: Copy the free maintenance variable but only for player ships.
* Only the story-related TLs use this variable. These TLs are the starting TL that the player gets and the Phanon Colony Ship for the Phanon plot.
* Add-Ons 1.1: If the ship is an OCV ship, start its timer.
* Add-Ons 1.3.10: Fixed bailed ships with hangars not repairing ships.
* Add-Ons 1.4.7: Bailed boardable ships will have an internal variable set. This is checked in ZH.Sig.Captured to ensure that the ship is not duplicated again.
* Add-Ons 1.4.10: Copy the number of pandora tunings over after boarding manned ships. For bailed (Mayhem.Task.BailCopy), we do it there instead.

sval.val: Note 1: the new ship doesn't always equip its lasers into the same slots.
Note 2: the new ship can spawn at a slightly different position.
* Add-Ons 1.2: The number of guns to retain for a captured ship is based on difficulty. Retain and equip 100%/75%/50%/25% on easy/normal/hard/insane.
* Does not apply to ships respawning due to friendly fire or station collision (see !ship.signal.killed).
if $captured == [TRUE]
if $difficulty == 1
* Normal
$nbSlots = ($nbSlots * 3) / 4
else if $difficulty == 2
* Hard
$nbSlots = $nbSlots / 2
else if $difficulty == 3
* Insane (add-ons 1.3)
$nbSlots = $nbSlots / 4
Non installed wares.
Installed wares.
Retain 100%/75%/50%/25% of lasers.
Insane (add-ons 1.3)
Add-Ons 1.4: Copy scan locked variable so that the copied ship cannot be scanned again.
Herobetty 5.4: Copy over the marines and free maintenance flag.
Add-Ons 1.4.10: Copy number of pandora tunings. Renegades can get up to 2 pandora tunings while others can get up to 1.
Add-Ons 1.3.14: Fix lasers sitting in cargo bay.
Add-Ons 1.3.14: Fix lasers sitting in cargo bay.
** DEBUG **
$text = 'Precondition: gun ' + $gun + ' at slot ' + $slot + ' in turret ' + $turret + '. Number of slots: ' + $nbSlots
write to player logbook $text
** END DEBUG **
If original slot was empty, skip.
Gun is the laser ware type this slot can use. Find the gun type in the surviving laser list.
How many of this gun type remain? If none, skip this slot.
Install the laser. Decrement the remaining count of this gun type.
** DEBUG **
$text = 'installing ' + $gun + ' to slot ' + $slot + ' in turret ' + $turret + ' . Quantity: ' + $qty
write to player logbook $text
** END DEBUG **
We don't want (duplicated) marines or any passengers.
Herobetty 5.4: (Comments only) First, delete the old marines and passengers. Based on testing, a cloned ship has duplicated marines. We don't want that.
Herobetty 5.4: Now copy the marines over, if there were any.
Add-Ons 1.4.7: Copy them over if the source was not destroyed. The only times that the source will not be destroyed are in ZH.Sig.Captured and in !ship.signal.killed.
Add-Ons 1.4: Fixed bailed ships being scannable. Technically, bailed ships are new ships, but all the metadata from the old ship is supposed to be copied over.
Herobetty 5.4: Copy the free maintenance variable but only for player ships.
Only the story-related TLs use this variable. These TLs are the starting TL that the player gets and the Phanon Colony Ship for the Phanon plot.
Add-Ons 1.1: If the ship is an OCV ship, start its timer.
Add-Ons 1.3.10: Fixed bailed ships with hangars not repairing ships.
Add-Ons 1.4.7: Bailed boardable ships will have an internal variable set. This is checked in ZH.Sig.Captured to ensure that the ship is not duplicated again.
Add-Ons 1.4.10: Copy the number of pandora tunings over after boarding manned ships. For bailed (Mayhem.Task.BailCopy), we do it there instead.
Add-Ons 1.4.22: Moved to new script.
